TopicTitle: The SPEAR - Super. Powerful. Ergonomic. Atmo. Racer.

Articles.Content:
Hello. This is my first craft that I wanted to show off despite being playing the game since before you had to buy it lol

First things off. This is a modded aircraft so you will need these mods:

-Procedural Landing Gear

-MK2 Expansion Pack

----

Let's get started then

The SPEAR is a 4 man aircraft (because that's just cool)

![64236a0d2ad06015f50a1642fd198813.jpg](http://i.gyazo.com/64236a0d2ad06015f50a1642fd198813.jpg)

Using the landing gear mod I was able to make some pretty .... under carriages.

![5c36efd2bb15e712eaeb9441c6e5ea58.jpg](http://i.gyazo.com/5c36efd2bb15e712eaeb9441c6e5ea58.jpg)

![0d32069df38f1f97759b0414fb3975b8.jpg](http://i.gyazo.com/0d32069df38f1f97759b0414fb3975b8.jpg)

![9518dc2c989eff5bbaa13925e86bc50b.png](http://i.gyazo.com/9518dc2c989eff5bbaa13925e86bc50b.png)

![8588118ad7a2340801816dbea6b79615.png](http://i.gyazo.com/8588118ad7a2340801816dbea6b79615.png)

She's super maneuverable, fast AND stable because of her fine tuned control surfaces and RCS Vernor system

![107595c6269e04311e975027eb5ad0cb.png](http://i.gyazo.com/107595c6269e04311e975027eb5ad0cb.png)

![5bb4ac81c9e83286890336bd59fdb78e.png](http://i.gyazo.com/5bb4ac81c9e83286890336bd59fdb78e.png)

Here's a full look at her front and rear

![bfb01c8a9a7a4433b97563a7242d7cb9.jpg](http://i.gyazo.com/bfb01c8a9a7a4433b97563a7242d7cb9.jpg)

WANT TO SEE THE REST OF HER?

[DOWNLOAD HERE!!](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/233193-spear)

Thank you for viewing and any comments or reviews would be appreciated ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
